issue.title: Metadata remplications should only list "provider" organisms
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Metadata replication modal offers a filter on organism.
It lists all organisms (at ASIT VD : > 1000)
It  should only contain "provider" organisms [ = organisms that have at least one resource] (at ASIT VD ~50).

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
